alert.note: Alert for Otero (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:12PM MDT until August 08 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Otero County in south central New Mexico... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 511 PM MDT, Severe thunderstorm winds were moving southeast near Holloman Air Force Base, This line of winds was moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alamogordo, White Sands National Monument, Holloman Air Force Base and Boles Acres. This includes the following highways... Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 198 and 212. Highway 54 in New Mexico near mile marker 60, and between mile markers 64 and 71. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
